summary: The Greatest Englishman tells the story of Captain Matthew Webb, the first-ever person to successfully swim the English Channel in 1875 equipped only with his moustache, doses of Brandy and a wire wool swimsuit.
cast: Warren Brown|Steve Oram|Georgia Maguire|Terry Mynott|Tom Stourton|Hannah Tointon|Keira Malik|Charles Reston|Si√¢n Rose Bennett|Alex Britton|Tom Cheshire|Jonathan Christie|William Donaldson|Jack Fishburn|Charlotte Gallagher|Robert Goodale|James Gray|Larissa Hardy|Ludo Hardy|Nico Hardy|Sam Hardy|Summer Hardy|Richard Holt|David Keyes|Dominic Kinnaird|Jake Lea-Wilson|Christopher Leveaux|Isobel Mascarenhas-Whitman|Thomas Matthews|Curran McKay|Tim Plester|Jonny Roberts|Finn Salter|James Schlesinger|Brice Stratford|Ivan Wilkinson
title: Captain Webb
